theory:
x * y \<longmapsto> (x << const (IntVal 64 i)) + x 
                              when (i > 0 \<and> stamp_expr x = IntegerStamp 64 xl xh \<and> wf_stamp x \<and>
                                    64 > i \<and>
                                    y = ConstantExpr (IntVal 64 ((2 ^ unat(i)) + 1)) )
